long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PrimeMate is a fast and streamlined primer generator for Ensembl. Generate hundreds of primer pairs with customizable parameters and sort them to your ideal specifications.

PrimeMate Features:

*Compatible with the Ensembl genome database: simply navigate to the desired sequence and click “find primers”

*Customizable optimal product length, melting temperature, G/C content, and dimerization/hairpin threshold

*Displays information for each product, including length, melting temperature, exon location, etc.

*Sorts results by user-selected criteria: adjust the sorting weight for each variable
Automatically filters undesirable products (self-dimerizing primers, suboptimal location on sequence, etc.)

*Saves user-selected sequences in “Favorites” row

*Copies user-selected sequences to clipboard for easy sharing
